name: Aleksandria
startIntroPart1: Hail Lyosha, may your laurus dreams bring countless glory upon thee, great Caesar of Aleksandria! Under your enlightened empire lies the vast expanse of the harsh tundra, and behind her veiled marvels hides the real strength of the Pearl of the North. Since the dawn of time your people managed to endure the arduous challenges posed by arctic life and, with a grain of ingenuity and a bit of pride, they succeded to thrive under the solitary bliss of boreal lights. Despite every type of adversity the empire still has to defy, it can steadily rely on their virtues and on your advice for its future to continue to shine.
startIntroPart2: O Alyosha, princeps Aleksandri, the Motherland calls and invokes your ambition to fulfill your destiny and lead her people. Will you patronize the flourishing of arts and sciences or will you promote the thriving of arms and strife? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar:
The deeds sing, goddess, of the Motherland's son,
whose war enterprises brought countless glories upon the Comrades,
and sent forth to Hades many valiant enemies.
attacked:
Finally someone ambitious enough to try to win me over.
May you succeed or die under my triumph.
defeated:
I know nothing about what I ignore - I'm aware of it -
and yet still my latest realization burns my soul almost as much,
in pride, I have burnt till now.
introduction:
Zdravstvuyte! I am Alyosha, the empiring prince of our glorious Motherland.
And I also happen to be the creator of 'The GUR' mod.
neutralYes: Our people are eager to accept.
hateLetsHearIt: Have you come here to negotiate your surrender?
hateYes: Its nice to see that we agree on something, from time to time.
afterPeace:
I must admit your military genius astonished me.
Consider yourself honored by my most sincere respect.
hateHello: Why are you still on this side of the Acheron?
tradeRequest:
Some believe that trade is the engine of the world.
Would you like to move it in this direction?
uniqueText:
Gain +1 [Culture] from every Camp and Pasture adjacent to Tundra
+1 [Science] from every Mine and Quarry next to Tundra
The amounts of bonus [Culture] and [Science] double during a Golden Age
uniques: [+1 Culture] from every [Camp] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]>
[+1 Culture] from every [Pasture] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]>
[+1 Science] from every [Mine] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]>
[+1 Science] from every [Quarry] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]>
[+1 Culture] from every [Camp] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]> <during a Golden Age>
[+1 Culture] from every [Pasture] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]> <during a Golden Age>
[+1 Science] from every [Mine] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]> <during a Golden Age>
[+1 Science] from every [Quarry] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]> <during a Golden Age>

name: M'Banza-Kongo
declaringWar: Do you really think you can walk over us so easily? I will not let it happen. Not to Kongo - not to my people!
attacked: We are no strangers to war. You have strayed from the right path, and now we will correct it.
defeated: You are nothing but a glorified barbarian. Cruel, and ruthless.

name: Bibracte
declaringWar: I have bested many enemies in war before, and finally I shall match my strength against yours!
attacked: Peace is stifling. Only in war can we see who is the greater chief.
defeated: Such power! Perhaps I underestimated you before.

name: Valletta
declaringWar: We don't like your face. To arms!
attacked: You will see you have just bitten off more than you can chew.
defeated: This ship may sink, but our spirits will linger.

name: Dublin
declaringWar: War lingers in our hearts. Why carry on with a false peace?
attacked: You gormless radger! You'll dine on your own teeth before you set foot in Ireland!
defeated: A lonely wind blows through the highlands today. A dirge for Ireland. Can you hear it?
